name: bootstrap-css
description: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.
author: The Bootstrap Authors (https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/graphs/contributors)

scripts.css-compile-main: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 bootstrap/scss/ -o flask_app/static/css/
scripts.css-minify-main: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output flask_app/static/css/bootstrap.min.css flask_app/static/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output flask_app/static/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css flask_app/static/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output flask_app/static/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css flask_app/static/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.lockfile-lint: lockfile-lint --allowed-hosts npm --allowed-schemes https: --empty-hostname false --type npm --path package-lock.json
